caption.p: Natural compounds in M. alba with antioxidative abilities. ( a) Chlorogenic acid; ( b) quercetin; ( c) rutin; ( d) quercitrin; ( e) isoquercitrin; ( f) dihydroquercetin; ( g) resveratrol; ( h) moracin; ( i) phenylpropanoids. 1 Refers to compounds in M. alba leaves; 2 refers to compounds in M. alba fruit; 3 refers to compounds in M. alba seeds.
